mapper.select: SELECT A.CUST_CODE as custCode, A.PROJECT_CODE as projectCode, A.PERSON_CODE as personCode, A.CALL_CODE as callCode, TO_CHAR(A.IN_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') as inDate, TO_CHAR(A.IN_DATE, 'HH24:MI:SS')as inTime, (SELECT ADM_SNAME FROM TSYS01 WHERE ADM_GUBN='4002'AND ADM_CODE=A.CS_TYPE) as csType, (SELECT ADM_SNAME FROM TSYS01 WHERE ADM_GUBN='4003'AND ADM_CODE=A.PRC_GUBN) as prcGubn, (SELECT ADM_SNAME FROM TSYS01 WHERE ADM_GUBN='5000'AND ADM_CODE=A.BUY_GUBN) as buyGubn, NVL((SELECT PERSON_NAME FROM TPER01 WHERE PERSON_CODE = A.PERSON_CODE AND CUST_CODE = #{params.custCode}), ' ') as empNo, (SELECT TEL_NO FROM TPER01 WHERE PERSON_CODE=A.PERSON_CODE AND CUST_CODE = #{params.custCode}) as custTell, A.CS_NOTE AS csNote, A.EMG_GUBN as emgGubn, NVL(A.CS_DATE,'') as csDate, NVL(A.CS_BANK,'') as csBank, NVL(A.CS_NAME,'') as csName, NVL(A.CS_CASH,'') as csCash, A.PRC_NOTE as prcNote FROM TBND01 A WHERE A.CUST_CODE = #{params.custCode} AND A.PROJECT_CODE = #{params.projectCode} AND A.PERSON_CODE = #{params.personCode} AND A.CALL_CODE = #{params.callCode}

SELECT A.CUST_CODE as custCode, A.PROJECT_CODE as projectCode, A.PERSON_CODE as personCode, A.CALL_CODE as callCode, TO_CHAR(A.IN_DATE,'YYYYMMDD HH24:MI:SS') as inDate, (SELECT ADM_SNAME FROM TSYS01 WHERE ADM_GUBN='4002'AND ADM_CODE=A.CS_TYPE) as csType, (SELECT ADM_SNAME FROM TSYS01 WHERE ADM_GUBN='4003'AND ADM_CODE=A.PRC_GUBN) as prcGubn, (SELECT ADM_SNAME FROM TSYS01 WHERE ADM_GUBN='5000'AND ADM_CODE=A.BUY_GUBN) as buyGubn, NVL((SELECT PERSON_NAME FROM TPER01 WHERE PERSON_CODE = A.PERSON_CODE AND CUST_CODE = #{params.custCode}), ' ') as empNo, (SELECT TEL_NO FROM TPER01 WHERE PERSON_CODE=A.PERSON_CODE AND CUST_CODE = #{params.custCode}) as custTell, A.CS_NOTE AS csNote, A.EMG_GUBN as emgGubn, NVL(A.CS_DATE,'') as csDate, NVL(A.CS_BANK,'') as csBank, NVL(A.CS_NAME,'') as csName, NVL(A.CS_CASH,'') as csCash, A.PRC_NOTE as prcNote FROM TBND01 A WHERE PERSON_CODE={params.personCode} ORDER BY IN_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBND01_MEMO( CUST_CODE, PROJECT_CODE, PERSON_CODE, CALL_CODE, SERL_NO, USER_ID, CONTEXT, DEL_GUBN, IN_DATE, IN_EMPNO ) VALUES ( #{comment.custCode}, #{comment.projectCode}, #{comment.personCode}, #{comment.callCode}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SERL_NO,'999,999,999')),0)+1 FROM TBND01_MEMO WHERE CUST_CODE = #{comment.custCode} AND PROJECT_CODE = #{comment.projectCode} AND PERSON_CODE = #{comment.personCode} AND CALL_CODE = #{comment.callCode} ), #{comment.userId}, #{comment.conText}, '0', SYSDATE, #{comment.userId} )
